comments:
Eclipse M9.

I had "custom=true" in my build.properties.
After removing it, it all works once again. Still, better error reporting could
be nice.

This has been fixed in RC1.
It will say something like: Could not write script 
c:\eclipse\workspace\net.genady.rmi\build.xml.

Can it also say why it is trying to read the file while it should be writing 
it?

traces.message: c:\eclipse\workspace\net.genady.rmi\build.xml (The system cannot find the file specified)
